biotools.summary: Platform is the only platform for standardising transcriptome projects: go from raw trace files to an annotated GBrowse interface driven by the Seqfeature database. It accepts both Sanger and 454 sequencing technology for a denovo assembly, annotation and data mining of EST data.

bioschemas.name: est2assembly
bioschemas.summary: Platform is the only platform for standardising transcriptome projects: go from raw trace files to an annotated GBrowse interface driven by the Seqfeature database. It accepts both Sanger and 454 sequencing technology for a denovo assembly, annotation and data mining of EST data.
